category1.name: Full Package
category1.description: You might as well adopt a pet if you choose this option.

category1.name: One Day
category1.description: We will drop off this pet in the morning and pick them up in the afternoon. Food not provided.

category1.name: One Week
category1.description: We will drop off and pick up this pet every day for one week. Food not provided.

category1.name: Overnight Package
category1.description: We will allow you to keep this pet overnight. Added to any of the base options. If none are selected, this will be for only one night.

category1.name: Food Package
category1.description: We will provide necessary food for the pet.

category1.name: Toy Package
category1.description: We will provide a handful of toys for you to play with the pet. You will be able to keep the toys for an added price.

category1.name: Clothing Package
category1.description: We will provide a few sets of clothing that the pet is comfortable with. Not all pets will be able to receive this.

category1.name: Add Another Pet
category1.description: We will bring along one more of this pet for double the fun!
